channel.title: Vrealize Orchestrator on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter
channel.description: Recent content in Vrealize Orchestrator on A Journey in Automating the Datacenter

item.title: Indy VMUG UserCon 2018 Slides
item.description: I’m really looking forward to presenting at the UserCon today. I’m especially excited as vRealize Orchestrator (vRO) is a tool that I think a lot of companies could leverage to start their automation journey. If anyone has any follow-up questions after the presentation, please feel free to reach out to me via Twitter or Email. As promised, you can download the slides from my presentation here.
